product_name: Good MoleculesCaffeine Energizing Hydrogel Eye Patches
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGet a bright, wide-awake look - no matter how much sleep you got the night before - with Good Molecules Caffeine Energizing Hydrogel Eye Patches. These masks work to brighten, hydrate, and reduce visible puffiness around the eyes. A perfect quick pick-me-up for puffy, tired-looking eyes.
details: DetailsKey Ingredients1% Caffeine - helps to energize, firm, and reduce puffiness for brighter, more youthful-looking eyes.Licorice Extract, Peptides, & Aloe Vera - work to brighten dark circles and plump the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.Hydrogel Technology - delivers moisturizing and firming ingredients into the delicate skin of the eye contour.Item 2582317How To UseApply to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Gently remove and massage any remaining serum into skin. Suitable for daily use. Can be used under the eyes, on frown lines, or anywhere your skin could use an energizing pick-me-up.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Caffeine, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Cellulose Gum, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glucomannan, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Butylene Glycol, Calcium Lactate, Sucrose, Calcium Chloride, Potassium Chloride, Arginine, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Gently remove and massage any remaining serum into skin. Suitable for daily use. Can be used under the eyes, on frown lines, or anywhere your skin could use an energizing pick-me-up.

reviews.headline: Caused mila bumps
reviews.comments: Love the tightening aspect of this product. However it had consistently caused mila bumps :( ughhh.

reviews.headline: Instant Visible Hydration & Cooling
reviews.comments:
These patches have saved me when I needed them. I'm a 28 year old male, and I don't usually struggle with dark circles because I've maintained my skin through skincare, fitness, and hydration since I was a young teen, but when I'm short on sleep, the puffiness and shadows show up FAST. 

The caffeine hydrogel formula is extremely hydrating and gives me a noticeable, immediate lift. My under-eyes look smoother, brighter, and less puffy right after removal. What I appreciate the most is how well-engineered the formula feels. It's clean with useful ingredients that actually do something instead of fillers. The instructions are very straightforward, though I do wish they'd specify placement more clearly. In the end though, I switch up the placement of the patches depending on my mood and still get the same results, as long as I cover the affected area.

I usually layer it with the Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel and it's AMAZING. All my friends have asked if I've had injections because the area looks so refreshed. This is a repeat purchase for me, and I've already started gifting it to friends. If you want fast, visible de-puffing with real hydration, this should be part of your arsenal.

reviews.headline: great
reviews.comments: worked great for my tired eyes, instant lift and no irritation, worth trying to see if your skin reacts. I will continue to buy this product, and I have tried A LOT of eye products

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: One of my favorite under eye patches.  Stays on and fully hydrates

reviews.headline: Very moisturizing and feel wonderful
reviews.comments:
I really enjoy these eye patches.  They are affordable and give me the relief I needed.  My eyes are less puffy and the skin feels soft.
Would recommend these!!

reviews.headline: Updated review
reviews.comments:
SOOOOO, I've had these for about a month(actually longer, finally used them). I put them on religiously every morning when I wake up for the last 3 weeks. And, let me tell you the results are outstanding! The difference between under eye skin and facial skin (cheeks) is incredibly noticeable; in a great way. It has made my under eye area SOOOO much smoother, brighter and tighter. I wish they made a face mask; I used one every night...hint hint wink wink!!! Not only did I notice a difference so did the man and the kids on different days (no, they didn't tell one another to say something). But, I am shocked! The results are amazing and consistency is key!!! 
ps- other products used along side with kiehls avocado eye cream and RoC hydration serum. After I took off the patches I put a full ringfinger tip amount of serum, split between each eye and allowed to that soak in a bit and then applied a thin yet thicker, a nice amount of eye cream under each eye and allowed that soak in on itself. Amazing

reviews.headline: Do not waste your money
reviews.comments: These are the worst eye patches I have tried. The serum is snail mucin consistency and leaves a residue   that has to be peeled off. The patches themselves are a gel-like consistency (but softer and mushier than most eye patches) and practically fall apart when you remove them from the container.

reviews.headline: Good and affordable product
reviews.comments: This is such a refreshing product. I just got it and it has helped I just got back from vacations so haven't slept well lately and this product has help.

reviews.headline: My favorite eye product!
reviews.comments: I buy these on repeat! They always make me look less tired and they leave the area under the eye looking hydrated and tight. I have very sensitive skin, and they never irritate my skin. I like to put them in the fridge too, the cold always wakes me up :)

reviews.headline: Get them
reviews.comments: Ive used for 2 days ubder eyes and nasolabial folds and i can visibly see a difference. Packing recommends different areas you can apply

reviews.headline: Harsh reaction!! Do not buy!!
reviews.comments: I am still in shock how awful these patches are! I tried them out because I love love good modecules hyaluronic acid serum that I use all the time, and to my surprise never had a reaction to the serum with my sensitive skin. Back to the patches, directions said to cleanse then dry and then apply the patches for 5‚Äì10 minutes. Patches went on easily and had a cooling effect at first but not even two minutes later I start to feel a tingling sensation and when I looked in the mirror under my eyes are bright red and swollen. I had to ice my face and wait for a while for the reaction to go away. Completely disappointed in this product and shame on me for not reading the reviews beforehand. Lesson learned.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: I'm using them but really don't see any difference.

reviews.headline: Good‚Ä¶but burning sensation!
reviews.comments: I enjoy using these patchea but the first couple tries were a very burning sensation, the first two tries being the WORST! I kept trying them to see if thw reaction would change and after about a week of using them they felt fine and no burning sensation. Use at your own risk!

reviews.headline: made my under eye all red :(
reviews.comments: made my under eye extremely red and swollen. returning this asap ive never had eyepatches do this

reviews.headline: Burning sensation
reviews.comments: First use it was fine. Couldn't wear sunscreen or other serum, it caused peeling. Second use burned my under eyes.

reviews.comments: I bought eye patches multiple times.  Love it.  They really work.  A must use item!

reviews.headline: Eye patches
reviews.comments:
Very goopy and too messy. Hard to get one patch out at a time. If there is too much product on the patch it dries to a slight film. 
Really wanted this to work, but sadly it didn't.

reviews.headline: This is my 2nd purchase
reviews.comments: This is so soothing and relaxing. I love the way my eyes feel as I am relaxing with these eye patches. I  love the results.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I have never used gel eye patches before. Wasn't sure if I would like them. I was very pleasantly surprised. I keep the jar in the refrigerator for extra cooling. They are fairly easy to use and feel WONDERFUL when applied. Reasonable too.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I just purchased these because I couldn't find my normal gold hydrogel patches. These feel just like any other hydrogel patch. 
- There's a tool provided to get the patches out. The 'slimy' feel is normal‚Ä¶like any hydrogel patch. 
-They stay put on your face & are very hydrating. 
I can't say anything about de-puffing, because it isn't an issue I have to a bothersome extent, but it certainly smooths out the area & tones just a teeny tiny bit. 
-The shape fit fine under my eyes with a little moulding. It's VERY‚Ä¶very obvious which way you're supposed to apply them to your face lol. 

Anyway‚Ä¶point is, after reading all these terrible reviews in the Ulta parking lot after purchase, I was afraid to open the jar; but I'm pleasantly surprised & will continue to finish out this product. Might even buy em' again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Unsure what people are complaining about.

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought these because I thought they may help reduce the appearance of my dark circles. Judging by the other positive reviews I believe this product works, but I am just not the target user. My dark circles are likely hereditary and my under eye area is not puffy. I've never noticed any positive benefits when using this product so I stopped reaching for it. I find the patches hard to keep in place, and I have to rinse off the product after use because even if it's been hours after removal, the residue causes pilling in my makeup or moisturizer. Not to mention products like this are quite wasteful. So I would not recommend to someone who has hereditary dark circles and doesn't experience puffiness.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ineffective
